text: Oh wow. These are so good. I think ‘Draw’ is probably my favourite one.

I don’t really know how to define it. Um, I guess it’s going to the workplace and seeing how it works, if you’re lucky you actually get to work with someone or help with a project they’re working on. Something like that.

Thank you, I would really appreciate it. There’s one that really caught my eye. It’s called ‘The Line’ and I quite like the work they’ve done so that’s my number one option. I haven’t emailed them yet though as I need to make sure my CV looks professional.
